CoC Guidelines

A community-supported repository regarding the Company of Champions Discord server's ratification of challenge runs.

Company of Champions Guidelines

Roles are obtainable for all listed games. Click the list below to go to the different game guidelines (or Index).

  • Index.
  • Demon’s Souls.
  • Dark Souls or Dark Souls: Remastered.
  • Dark Souls II or Dark Souls II: Scholar of the First Sin.
  • Dark Souls III.
  • Bloodborne.
  • Hollow Knight.

Please remember to check necessary global requirements (e.g. recording for a legend run). Read the Index page.
